column4: Hi does anyone know much about cloning? I have got 46 laptops i need to clone. All of them will be coming with windows XP installed on them and one of them will be having a program put on, then im going ot take the image form that one and put it onto the other 45....the thing is liscensing....does clonezilla have a tool that lets the other 45 machines keep thier liscenses even tho they having an image of another machine slapped on them?
you can exchange the license key afterwards
how? would you e able to point me in the direction of a tutorial on that?
howto exchenge license key for windows xp can be found at support.microsoft.com.....search their database
